Date: Wednesday, 2/5/1985
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Billy Farmer



Date: Wednesday, 2/5/1985
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Cincinnati has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Billy Farmer
